text: Bridgeton is a city in Cumberland County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 United States Census, the city's population was 27,263. It is the county seat of Cumberland County.New Jersey County Map, New Jersey Department of State. Accessed July 10, 2017. Bridgeton, Millville, and Vineland are the three main cities of the Vineland-Millville-Bridgeton metropolitan statistical area. ==References== Category:Cities in New Jersey Category:County seats in New Jersey
title: Bridgeton, New Jersey
